version_description:
Thank you for helping Temple Run hit over 100 MILLION downloads!

In this update, we added support for iOS 6 and the new iPhone 5! This includes:

- Bigger screen size for iPhone 5
- New social sharing feature. Now share your scores via Facebook, Twitter, and other social networks.
- Lots of bug fixes

Keep running!

Thanks for making Temple Run one of the most popular apps of all time - over 500 million players!

This small update fixes some bugs and upgrades some of our back end systems.

Keep running!

Wow, thank you all so much for making Temple Run a huge hit! We've read all your reviews and heard all of your suggestions, and we are planning on updating Temple Run more in the future to include lots of great new content!

This is just a quick update for now:

- We fixed the bug in the Stats display. Longest Run and Total Distance will now show the correct values.

Also, we added a couple of new objectives to achieve and increase your multiplier!
- The Mega Bonus Objective
- The Resurrection Objective
- The Double Resurrection objective

We love hearing all your ideas and feedback! You can leave your feedback in the reviews, or you can find us on Facebook:

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Temple-Run/215459165171017

And of course, you can always email us at support@imangistudios.com.

Happy Running!

You wanted more characters and power ups, and we delivered! This update will give you plenty of reasons to keep running:

- More Characters! Run as Scarlett or Montana!
- More Powerups! Speed through the game with Boost, or power through the beginning with Head Start!
- More Achievements!
- Bug Fixes
- Special offers to earn free coins

Thanks for all your amazing reviews! If you like this update, leave us a review or update your old one, so we can keep the updates coming!

We love hearing your ideas and feedback! You can leave your feedback in the reviews, or you can find us on Facebook:

http://www.facebook.com/TempleRun

And of course, you can always email us at support@imangistudios.com.

Now run for your life!

For our 3rd update, we added a ton of stuff that will keep you running!

★ Universal iPad Support! Run for your life on the big screen!

★ Two new characters to unlock! Barry Bones, a city cop with an attitude, and Karma Lee, the fastest legs in the Far East. To unlock new characters, just go to the Store and scroll down.

★ More objectives to increase your score multiplier!

★ You can now Tweet your score at the end of a game! That way all your friends will know you're the Temple Run champ!

★ More ways to get free coins! Go to Store > Get More Coins to check it out!

★ Lots of performance enhancements and bug fixes! Temple Run should run smoother than ever!

Have something to say, or just want to show off your high score? Check out Temple Run on Facebook!

http://www.facebook.com/TempleRun

For our 4th update, we added all sorts of fun stuff for you to play with!

- If you're on Game Center, you can now see how far your friends ran as you play! Can you beat your rivals? You can toggle this on and off in the Options.

- 2 new characters! Play as Zack Wonder, the football star, or Francisco Montoya, the conquistador searching for the fountain of youth!

- 6 new achievements!

- 3 wallpapers to unlock!

- So many bug fixes! Let us know if you find bugs!

Thank you for making Temple Run a huge hit! Join our Facebook page to stay ahead of updates, leave feedback and talk to other Temple Runners:

http://www.facebook.com/TempleRun

Keep on running!!!

Keith, Natalia and Kiril (Imangi Studios)

This update is a small bug fix that fixes a crash that was happening on older devices after the last update.

Thanks for making Temple Run one of the most popular apps of all time!

This small update fixes some bugs and adds iOS10 compatibility.

Keep running!

Lifetime Coin Stat bug squashed.

Thanks for making Temple Run one of the most popular apps of all time!

Thank you for helping Temple Run hit over 100 MILLION downloads worldwide!

In this update:

- Beautiful high res graphics for the retina iPad!
- New Powerup: PermaWings! Put these on at the beginning of the game, and you will resurrect when you die!
- Ability to disable and enable individual power ups!
- More achievements!
- Fixed a few bugs

Keep running!
